content: Yes, I have experience in coordinating and leading internal teams as well as working with advisors. In my previous role as Corporate Development Manager, I was responsible for driving M&A activities and ensuring that all internal teams were aligned with our goals and objectives. This included working with different departments such as finance, legal, and HR to ensure that all aspects of the transaction were covered. Additionally, I have worked with external advisors such as investment bankers, lawyers, and consultants to support our M&A activities. This required strong communication and coordination skills, as well as the ability to build strong relationships with all stakeholders involved. Overall, I have found that effective coordination and collaboration is key to achieving successful M&A transactions.
